articles.content: Nothing may only have one smartphone on sale right now, but the company is aiming to be a go-to choice for Android fans that don't want to have a Pixel phone. Android 14 Beta 1 landed on Pixel phones… [+1520 chars]

articles.title: First Babies Born After Being Conceived By Robot - Futurism
articles.description: A Spanish startup has built a sperm-injecting robot that can be controlled using a PlayStation controller.
articles.content: A Spanish startup has built a sperm-injecting robot that can be controlled using a PlayStation controller. The team successfully used it to fertilize human eggs, eventually resulting in the birth of … [+2362 chars]
